SVGAttributeStroke-miterlimit.summary: The stroke-miterlimit attribute is a presentation attribute defining a limit on the ratio of the miter length to the stroke-width used to draw a miter join. When the limit is exceeded, the join is converted from a miter to a bevel.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute stroke-miterlimit can be used as a CSS property.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
